attributes.action: Government to scrap inheritance tax changes for British farmers
attributes.additional_details: The recent changes to inheritance tax regulations in the our country have sparked significant concern among British farmers and the wider agricultural community. These changes, intended to increase government revenues, risk undermining the very backbone of rural Britain. Scrapping these new inheritance tax measures would help protect the unique heritage, culture, and economic stability that British farming provides.
attributes.background: Ask the Government to scrap the new budget change on inheritance tax for British farmers.. this change has been put forward in the latest budget.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
